TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IComSoapMetadata

Docs.summary: Specifies methods for generating common language runtime (CLR) metadata for a COM+ component.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapMetadata> interface does not need to be implemented directly in your code. It is implemented by the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.GenerateMetadata> class in the .NET Framework infrastructure.
If necessary, <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapMetadata> specifies that an assembly that contains CLR metadata is generated for a specified type library.
<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapMetadata> is used internally by the .NET Framework. You do not need to use it directly in your code.

MemberSignature.Value: public string Generate (string SrcTypeLibFileName, string OutPath);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string Generate(string SrcTypeLibFileName, string OutPath) cil managed
Public Function Generate (SrcTypeLibFileName As String, OutPath As String) As String
public: System::String ^ Generate(System::String ^ SrcTypeLibFileName, System::String ^ OutPath);
abstract member Generate : string * string -> string

Docs.param: The name of the type library for which to generate an assembly.
The folder in which to generate an assembly.
Docs.summary: Generates an assembly that contains common language runtime (CLR) metadata for a COM+ component represented by the specified type library.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If necessary, the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapMetadata.Generate%2A> method specifies that an assembly that contains CLR metadata is generated for a specified type library.

MemberSignature.Value: public string GenerateSigned (string SrcTypeLibFileName, string OutPath, bool InstallGac, out string Error);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string GenerateSigned(string SrcTypeLibFileName, string OutPath, bool InstallGac, [out] string& Error) cil managed
Public Function GenerateSigned (SrcTypeLibFileName As String, OutPath As String, InstallGac As Boolean, ByRef Error As String) As String
public: System::String ^ GenerateSigned(System::String ^ SrcTypeLibFileName, System::String ^ OutPath, bool InstallGac, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % Error);
abstract member GenerateSigned : string * string * bool * -> string

Docs.param: The name of the type library for which to generate an assembly.
The folder in which to generate an assembly.
A flag that indicates whether to install the assembly in the global assembly cache.
A string to which an error message can be written.
Docs.summary: Generates an assembly that contains common language runtime (CLR) metadata for a COM+ component represented by the specified type library, signs the assembly with a strong-named key pair, and installs it in the global assembly cache.

remarks.format:
## Remarks If necessary, the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapMetadata.GenerateSigned%2A> method specifies that an assembly that contains CLR metadata is generated for a specified type library. Additionally, <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapMetadata.GenerateSigned%2A> generates a strong-named key pair and signs the assembly.
The `InstallGac` parameter indicates whether to install the assembly in the global assembly cache. However, the one implementation of <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapMetadata.GenerateSigned%2A>, by the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.GenerateMetadata> class, ignores this value and always attempts to install the signed assembly in the global assembly cache.
